ValidationRule.description: Proposal Status must be Accepted to move to Contract stage
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Corporate_Partnership', ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Contract'), NOT( ISPICKVAL( Proposal_Status__c , 'Accepted')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Proposal status must be accepted in order to progress to the contract stage.
